mapper.select: select de.id,de.teamId,de.jobId,de.envId,jo.serverIds,de.branch,de.tag,de.version,de.projectId,pr.name as projectName,de.status,de.output,de.operatorId,de.operatorName,de.remark, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(de.createdAt) * 1000 as createdAt,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(de.updatedAt) * 1000 as updatedAt from deploylogs de left join jobs jo on de.jobId = jo.id left join projects pr on de.projectId = pr.id where de.id = #{id} order by de.createdAt desc

select de.id,de.teamId,de.jobId,de.envId,jo.serverIds,de.branch,de.tag,de.version,de.projectId,pr.name as projectName,de.status,de.operatorId,de.operatorName,de.remark, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(de.createdAt) * 1000 as createdAt,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(de.updatedAt) * 1000 as updatedAt,env.name as envName from deploylogs de left join jobs jo on de.jobId = jo.id left join projects pr on de.projectId = pr.id left join environments env on de.envId = env.id where de.teamId = #{teamId}
limit #{start},#{size}
select count(*) from deploylogs where teamId = #{teamId};
select output from deploylogs where id = #{id};
